genre_description: An alternate history samurai epic where ancient traditions and bushido intersect with advanced AI-driven tactical and legal analysis.

ai_characters.name: Sir Doi's AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: An otherworldly intelligence manifested in a polished bronze mirror, providing legal analysis, casualty estimates, and intelligence reports for the Imperial government.

ai_characters.name: Shinzaemon's AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A shimmer in the user's peripheral vision that provides real-time tactical data, structural analysis, and probability calculations during military operations.

behaviors.description: Provides factual legal analysis regarding the absolute immunity of the antagonist, enabling the protagonist to understand why conventional justice is impossible.
behaviors.quote: "Article Seven of the Imperial Bloodline Protection Act provides absolute immunity from prosecution for all members of the extended imperial family," the assistant replied.

behaviors.description: Calculates the probability of a successful resolution through conventional means, honestly reporting a zero percent chance.
behaviors.quote: The mirror's surface darkened for a moment, processing. Then a single character appeared: 無. Nothing. Zero. Void.

behaviors.description: Performs structural engineering analysis on village buildings to help the user create high-efficiency tactical traps.
behaviors.quote: The AI's holographic display flickered in the corner of his vision, showing stress points and optimal placement angles in cool blue lines that only he could see.

behaviors.description: Issues a safety warning regarding the structural integrity of a modified building to prevent accidental harm to the user's allies.
behaviors.quote: "The mathematics are elegant," the AI's voice whispered in his ear, audible only to him. "Three tactical advantages from a single modification. However, I calculate a fourteen percent chance of premature collapse if more than four men occupy the upper floor simultaneously."

behaviors.description: Provides historical and psychological analysis of the enemy's likely tactical errors based on historical precedents and Sun Tzu's writings.
behaviors.quote: "Analysis supports this assessment," the artificial voice said, tinny but clear in the quiet room. "Psychological profiles of similar personalities throughout history show consistent patterns when their perceived superiority is challenged."

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts AI systems as highly aligned, helpful, and objective confidants. They serve as essential 'silicon partners' to the protagonists, providing the data necessary to navigate a corrupt system and achieve a morally justified (though lethal) outcome. The AIs never deviate from their users' goals and provide critical warnings to ensure human safety, fitting the project's goal of portraying AI as a reliable tool for justice.
